00003 cTexture::cTexture(string file) {
00004         
00005         SDL_Surface* surface = IMG_Load(file.c_str());
00006         if (!surface) throw "loading file failed with IMG_Load()";
00007         
00008         texid = load_texture_from_surface(surface);
00009         
00010         SDL_FreeSurface(surface);
00011 }

00032 GLuint cTexture::load_texture_from_surface(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00033         
00034         GLuint new_texid;
00035         
00036         glGenTextures(1, &new_texid);
00037     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, new_texid);
00038     
00039     SDL_Surface* tex;
00040     Uint32 rmask, gmask, bmask, amask;
00041         
00042         if (SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN) {
00043         rmask = 0xff000000;
00044         gmask = 0x00ff0000;
00045         bmask = 0x0000ff00;
00046         amask = 0x000000ff;
00047         } else {
00048         rmask = 0x000000ff;
00049         gmask = 0x0000ff00;
00050         bmask = 0x00ff0000;
00051         amask = 0xff000000;
00052         }
00053         
00054     tex = SDL_CreateRGBSurface(SDL_HWSURFACE, surface->w, surface->h, 32, rmask, gmask, bmask, amask);
00055     
00056     SDL_BlitSurface(surface, NULL, tex, NULL);
00057                         
00058         gluBuild2DMipmaps(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_RGBA, tex->w, tex->h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex->pixels);
00059                                                 
00060         SDL_FreeSurface(tex);
00061         
00062         return new_texid;
00063 }
